items.name: Diani Mangrove Eco-Trails
items.short_description: Explore pristine mangrove boardwalks and learn about Ukunda's vital coastal ecosystem. Guided tours offer birdwatching and insights into marine life.
items.address: Gazi Bay Road, near Kongo River estuary, Ukunda

items.name: Azure Kitesurf Academy & Paddle Club
items.short_description: Offering lessons and rentals for kitesurfing, stand-up paddleboarding, and kayaking. Enjoy the clear waters of Diani Beach with professional instructors.
items.address: Diani Beach Road, next to Nomads, Ukunda

items.name: Ukunda Artisan's Village
items.short_description: A vibrant hub showcasing local Swahili crafts, paintings, and sculptures. Meet the artists and find unique souvenirs while supporting the community.

items.name: Diani Family Fun Park
items.short_description: A new outdoor park featuring mini-golf, trampolines, a splash zone, and a dedicated toddler play area. Perfect for a fun-filled day out with the kids.

items.name: The Coral Reef Lounge & Grill
items.short_description: An upscale beachfront dining experience offering fresh seafood, international cuisine, and creative cocktails. Enjoy stunning ocean views and live music in the evenings.

items.name: Swahili Spice Kitchen
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in the rich flavors of coastal Kenya with hands-on cooking classes. Learn to prepare traditional Swahili dishes using fresh, local ingredients.
items.address: Ukunda Town Center, off Diani Beach Road

items.name: Ukunda Ocean Guardians Sanctuary
items.short_description: A non-profit center dedicated to marine conservation, focusing on coral reef restoration and sea turtle rehabilitation. Educational tours and volunteer opportunities available.
items.address: Near Chale Island junction, Diani Beach

items.name: Diani Canopy Challenge
items.short_description: An aerial adventure park featuring ziplines, rope bridges, and high-ropes courses suitable for all ages. Experience the Diani forest canopy from a new perspective.
items.address: Near Kaya Kinondo Sacred Forest, Diani

items.name: Zuri Sands Wellness Retreat
items.short_description: A serene boutique retreat offering yoga, meditation, and spa treatments amidst lush gardens. Focus on holistic well-being and relaxation, just steps from the beach.
items.address: Galu Beach Road, south of Diani

items.name: Diani Eats Street Food Hub
items.short_description: A vibrant gathering of diverse food trucks and street food vendors offering local and international flavors. Enjoy casual dining, live music, and a lively atmosphere in the evenings.
items.address: Off Ukunda-Lunga Lunga Road, near Ukunda CBD
